org.apache.james.smtpserver.fastfail

Class ValidRcptMX

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.smtpserver.fastfail.ValidRcptMX
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.james.protocols.api.handler.LifecycleAwareProtocolHandler, org.apache.james.protocols.api.handler.ProtocolHandler, InitializingLifecycleAwareProtocolHandler, org.apache.james.protocols.smtp.hook.Hook, org.apache.james.protocols.smtp.hook.RcptHook

    public class ValidRcptMX
extends Object
implements InitializingLifecycleAwareProtocolHandler, org.apache.james.protocols.smtp.hook.RcptHook
    This class can be used to reject email with bogus MX which is send from a authorized user or an authorized network.
